Name.description: Marketing name associated with the availability of an item (e.g. Happy Hour).
Marketing name associated with the availability of an item (e.g. Happy Hour).

SKU.description: The Stock Keeping Unit.  A code that identifies a product.

productName.description: The name of the product for which the product code belongs.

productCode.description: The SKU code for the product.

taxExemptInd.description: When true, this item is not taxable  When false, this item is taxable.

MediaURI.description: The URI for the media asset.

KnownAssetNumber.description: The Known Asset Number for the media asset.

Name.description: The name of the category for this specific media asset.

uRI.description: A URI to day part details.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the day part (e.g. Breakfast, Lunch, Brunch, Dinner).

Description.description: A textual description of the tax.

taxIncludedInd.description: When true, tax is included in the price amount.

Description.description: A textual description of the surcharge.

surchargeIncludedInd.description: When true, the surcharge is included in the item price.

valueType.description: Specifies if the discount is expressed as an amount or a percent.

value.description: The discount amount or percentage.  The value type defines whether the value is an amount or a percent.

beforeTaxInd.description: When true, the discount is applied before tax.  When false, the discount applies after tax.

LocationID.description: A unique global identifier for the location.
A unique global identifier for the location.

Description.description: A description of the location (e.g. store , ghost kitchen).

PreferredStoreDescription.description: Describes the context of the preferred store, such as for work, or for multibrand conglomerates, or aggregators.

preferredStoreIndicatorInd.description: When true, this store is a favorite.

preferredStoreIndicatorInd.description: When true, this store is a favorite.

ClosedDate.description: Specifies the date a location is to close.

StreetAddress.description: The street number and street name.

CityName.description: The name of the city in which the entitiy is located.

PostalCode.description: Specifies the zip code for the entity.

Country.description: Specifies the country in which the entity is located.

StateOrTerritory.description: Specifies the state, territory or province in which the entity is located,

Latitude.description: The measure of the angular distance on the meridean north or south of the equator.

Longitude.description: The measure of the angular distance on the meridian east or west of the prime meridian.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the main phone number for the person.

PromotionCode.description: A code that the guest provides to invoke a discount on the menu product (e.g. promotion, charity event).

Description.description: Provides a description of the promotion or charity event identified in the promotion code.

language.description: The language in which the name is represented.

First.description: The first name or given name of the person.

Middle.description: The middle name of the person.

Prefix.description: Salutation for the person (e.g. Mr., Mrs., Ms., Dr., etc.)

Suffix.description: A suffix related to the name (e.g. Jr., Sr., III, Esq., etc.).

Title.description: Specifies degrees or honors of the person (e.g. M.D., Ph.D., etc.).

LastNamePrefix.description: Specifies the last name prefix (e.g. \"Van der\", \"von\", \"de\", etc.).

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the default or primary name for the person.

CurrencyCode.description: An ISO 4217 alpha character code used to specify the monetary unit.

decimalPlaces.description: An ISO 4201 \"minor unit\" typically used when an amount is sent without the decimal places to specify where the decimal should be placed (e.g. 2500 USD with 2 minor units would represent $25.00)

Quantity.description: The number of the packing item to be included.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the primary email address for the person.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the primary method for communication for this individual.

ChangeDate.description: The date and time that the status changed (ISO 8601), this is preferred data and should be sent if available.

ChangedBy.description: An identifier for the system that made the status change on the profile.

SystemName.description: The name of the system that made the status change.

Comment.description: Provides details around the nature or cause of the status change.

examples.value: System status changed based on inactivity.

acceptanceInd.description: When true, the customer as agreed to the terms and conditions.

BrandName.description: The brand name for the group of restaurants (i.e. McDonalds, Panera, etc.).

Reference.description: The reference object is used to identify an item related to but not contained within this transaction (e,g. identifies a check that is associated to another check).

name.description: Specifies the type of reference (e.g. stall number, counter number, table tent number, etc.)

sourceSystem.description: Specifies the system from which the ID originated.

Tip.description: An optional addition to the payment to reward good service.

Gratuity.description: A mandatory addition to the check for service.

TenderDescription.description: Provides information regarding the tender type.

AuthorizationCode.description: The code returned by the authorization system.

LastFour.description: The last four digits of a credit\/debit card.

FirstSix.description: The first six digits of a credit\/debit card.

AccountNumber.description: Specifies account information for tender types other than credit cards.

tenderPresenceInd.description: When true, the payment method was present at the transaction location.

depositInd.description: When true, this payment is applied as a deposit (e.g. for a reservation or future order).
